Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.PlayerController
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the actions performed by each player during the game, checking the legality of the moves and executing them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlayerController​(GameController gameController)
    Constructor: create a new PlayerController with reference to the game controller

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerController

      public PlayerController​(GameController gameController)
      Constructor: create a new PlayerController with reference to the game controller
      Parameters:
      gameController - the game controller

  • Method Details

    • activateLeaderCard

      public void activateLeaderCard​(Player player, LeaderCard leader)
      Activates a leader card. If it's not the player's turn, prints an error and returns. If the player does not meet the requirements, prints an error and returns.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who wants to activate a card
      leader - the leader card to be activated

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(Player player, DevelopmentCard developmentCard, int slot)
      Make a player buy a development card. If the card is null, prints an error and returns. If the player cannot afford the card, or does not have a space for the card, prints an error and returns. Prior to buying the card, checks if the player has any discount granted by the leaders.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who wants to buy the card
      developmentCard - the desired development card
      slot - the slot of the player's board where to stack the bought card

    • updatePlayerDeposit

      public void updatePlayerDeposit​(Player player, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> changes, java.util.List<Resource> toBeStored, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> leadersDeposit)
      Updates a player deposit after storing a resource or moving rows, if the move is legal. If it's not the player's turn, prints an error and returns.
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the deposit
      changes - a map containing the indexes of the changed rows and the new rows to replace them with
      toBeStored - the list of drawn resource still waiting to be stored
      leadersDeposit - the leaders deposits granted by some leaders

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(Player player, LeaderCard card)
      Discards a leader from the player hand and gives the player a faith point. If it's not the player's turn, prints an error and returns. Also checks if the player has crossed a pope reports, or if the player has reached the end of the faith track.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that wants to discard a leader
      card - the card to be activated

    • useMarket

      public void useMarket​(Player player, int selection, java.util.List<Resource> whiteConversions)
      Makes the player use the market giving him the drawn resources and shifting the market row/column. Also, converts the white resources with the requested conversion resource, if specified. If it's not the player's turn, prints an error and returns. If the player does not have a leader that grants the selected white resource conversion, prints an error and returns.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that wants to use the market
      selection - the selected row/column (columns -> 0,1,2,3; rows -> 4,5,6)
      whiteConversions - the list of requested conversion resources

    • useProductions

      public void useProductions​(Player player, java.util.List<Production> productions)
      Performs the selected various productions calling the appropriate method for each one. If an error occurs during a production, prints an error message and skips the production. At the end, adds the sum of faith points to the player, checks if the player crossed a pope report or made the game end. Eventually, stores the obtained resources in the strongbox.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that wants to perform the productions
      productions - the list of productions

    • useBaseProduction

      public java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> useBaseProduction​(Player player, java.util.List<Resource> baseProductionInput, java.util.List<Resource> baseProductionOutput)
      Executes a player board production with the given input and return the desired output resource. If it's not the player's turn, prints an error and returns. If the player has specified less then two inputs, prints an error and returns. If the player has not specified an output resource, prints an error and returns. If the player has not enough resource to complete the production, prints an error and returns.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that uses the production
      baseProductionInput - the two production input resources
      baseProductionOutput - the output resource
      Returns:
      a map containing the output resource

    • useDevelopmentProduction

      public java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> useDevelopmentProduction​(Player player, DevelopmentCard card) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Uses the production of the given DevelopmentCard.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that wants to use this production
      card - the wanted development card
      Returns:
      a map containing the results of this production
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if
      • it's not the player's turn
      • the card is null
      • the player does not have enough resources

    • useLeaderProduction

      public java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> useLeaderProduction​(Player player, LeaderCard card, Resource output) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Uses the production ability of the given LeaderCard with the given Resource as the output.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that wants to use this production power
      card - the leader card with the wanted production ability
      output - the resource that will be awarded as an output of this production
      Returns:
      a map containing the results of this production
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if
      • it's not the player's turn
      • the card is null or not active
      • the resource is null or is Resource.FAITH
      • the card does not have a production power
      • the player does not have enough resources

    • handleInitialSelection

      public void handleInitialSelection​(Player player, java.util.List<LeaderCard> cards, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> selectedResources)
      Selects the LeaderCards that the Player wants to keep, discarding the others.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is selecting the cards
      cards - a list of cards that has been selected, the length of this list must be 2, otherwise prints an error to console and returns

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage​(Player sender, java.lang.String message)
      Sends a chat message to all players.
      Parameters:
      sender - the player who wrote this message
      message - the message that will be sent
